segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman looks while everything is going wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and she’s just standing there, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to be in for a big surprise when she finally notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll be mad when she sees the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really taking a risk up there on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t fall and break something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her treat, so cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like laughing at how absurd this whole situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a perfect snapshot of a chaotic kitchen moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
